Below is the planned daily schedule organized around *The Consultant's OS*. Each week introduces a core operating action and shows how students apply it to both recruiting and client work. Class meets **Tuesday/Thursday 12:30–1:45 PM**. Dates, topics, and assignments may adjust as needed.

## OS Imperatives Summary

| Imperative | Weeks | Core Idea | Recruiting Version | Client Version |
|:-----------|:-----:|:----------|:-------------------|:---------------|
| **Think Clearly** | 3-5 | Structure the problem before solving it | Structure your story before telling it | Structure the analysis before researching |
| **Get to the Right Answer** | 6-8 | Find facts, estimate, synthesize | Research firms/people; case math | Research companies; size opportunities |
| **Move Work Forward** | 9-10 | Plan, execute, adapt | Manage your recruiting process | Manage your project workstream |
| **Create Impact** | 11-14 | Communicate so people act | Tell stories that get you hired | Tell stories that move clients |

---

## TA Pod Schedule

Throughout the semester, you will meet with your TA pod for:

- **Goals Chat (Week 2 - Jan 13-15)**: 15-minute individual meeting to discuss recruiting goals
- **Feedback Session 1 (Week 6 - Feb 10-12)**: Progress check on resume and networking
- **Feedback Session 2 (Week 9 - Mar 3-5)**: Mid-semester check-in, case practice feedback
- **Feedback Session 3 (Week 11 - Mar 17-19)**: Interview prep assessment
- **Feedback Session 4 (Week 14 - Apr 7-9)**: Final reflection and next steps before capstone

---

## Case Practice Sessions

Case practice is essential preparation for consulting interviews. The recommended schedule:

| Weeks | OS Phase | Focus | Minimum Cases |
|:------|:---------|:------|:-------------:|
| 1-5 | Think Clearly | Observing cases, learning to structure | 1-2 |
| 6-8 | Get to the Right Answer | Math, estimation, synthesis | 3-4 |
| 9-10 | Move Work Forward | Full cases with ambiguity | 2-3 |
| 11-15 | Create Impact | Mock interviews, delivery polish | 2-3 |
| **Total** | | | **8-12 cases** |
